column4: Hello, all! How do Ubuntu Developers like ReiserFS or Reiser4?
you just dont hear much about any of the ReiserFS's  these days. BTRFS is the next big thing i guess.
i did see where the next fedora may default to btrfs. so that is looking like the future. Theres been talk of ubuntu doing the same. but personally for my needs. I dont think it matters.
